item.title: [GRATUIT] Cults3d > HEI_3D > Seraphita_the_Purifying_Flame___Adepta_Sororitas [non dl]

Description :

1
2
3

**Model Description:**
**"In the name of the Emperor, cleanse the filth of heresy!"**
This 3D printed model is inspired by the Adepta Sororitas in the Warhammer 40K universe, and reinterprets their sacredness and majesty in a cartoon style. The character is portrayed as the embodiment of the Empire's faith - wearing a finely crafted **Holy Power Armor**, with a burning Imperial double-headed eagle and scripture prayers engraved on the surface of the armor, symbolizing its dual mission as the **Sword of the State Religion** and the **Vanguard of the Inquisition**. The model is extremely dynamic. The nun is leaping and swinging a sword, with broken chaos symbols under her feet, as if she is tearing apart the darkness with her fervent faith.
